observation: Navigating to https://www.nchm.org/ returned status code 200

thought: The website is accessible. Now I need to extract the text from the HTML to analyze the content for scam characteristics.
observation: National Center for Housing Management | Housing Training & Certifications  800-368-5625 service@nchm.org Login to Learning Center 0 Items HUD Compliance HOTMA Certified Occupancy Specialist (COS) COS – Public Housing (COSP) COS – Vouchers (COSV) Enterprise Income Verification Specialist (EIVS) EIV Troubleshooting HOME Compliance Specialist (HCS) MOR Specialist (MORS) Rural Housing Specialist (RHS) COS-Prep Webinars Tax Credits Tax Credit Specialist (TCS) Property Management Certified Manager of Maintenance (CMM) Certified Manager of Housing (CMH) Fair Housing Essentials (FHE) Registered Housing Manager (RHM) On-Demand Training Employment Testing Resources Certification Renewal About NCHM Careers Frequently Asked Questions National Registry Verified Employers eHotline Select Page Please Wait Industry-leading training from a name that opens doors. As the ultimate resource for knowledge and credibility, owners and managers count on us to keep them ahead of the curve. FULL COURSE SCHEDULE LIHTC Upcoming Online Training Our live online training courses allow you to earn your certification no matter where you are. Taught by NCHM’s leading instructors live, online training will help you improve your knowledge, earn your certification and increase your effectiveness immediately. May 28-31, 2024 The COS training is a comprehensive study of HUD’s Office of Multifamily Housing guidelines and regulations set forth in HUD Handbook 4350.3 REV-1 and subsequent notices. Register Now TCS provides a thorough review of IRS regulations and guidance, including the IRS’s Guide for Completing Form 8823. HOTMA Compliance Register today for NCHM’s comprehensive training on HOTMA, a major change to the affordable housing industry. SEE FULL ONLINE SCHEDULE Upcoming Webinars HOTMA Tenant Selection Plan Update May 14, 2024 1-3PM HOTMA has changed the requirements for Tenant Selection Plans and introduced new discretionary topics. Register LIHTC Compliance 2024 This four-hour special webinar will encourage discussion and boost your confidence in facing the new world of affordable housing. Understanding NSPIRE Jun 18, 2024 1-4PM Find out what you need to know to be prepared for the transition from UPCS and HQS to NSPIRE. Our Mandate We are the only organization mandated by the President of the United States to professionalize the housing industry. As the ultimate resource for knowledge, status, and credibility, owners and managers count on us to keep them ahead of the curve on complex regulations and industry best practices. We professionalize people and organizations, making them more valuable and effective. Latest News & Insights IRS Releases Updated 8823 Guide Feb 8, 2024 The long-awaited updated version of the IRS’s Guide for Completing Form 8823 has been released. HUD Updates List of Federally Mandated Exclusions from Income After Ten Years Jan 31, 2024 Nearly ten years after its last update, the new list of Federally Mandated Exclusions from income was published in the Federal Register on January 31, 2024. Remembering William Fitzhugh Fox Dec 13, 2023 We sadly report the passing of William “Bill” Fitzhugh Fox, the longest serving Board member in NCHM history. SEE MORE LATEST NEWS FROM NCHM Veterans for Housing Initiative Support for veterans of the United States armed services is a national priority, and many organizations have answered the call to help veterans in the areas of health care, housing, jobs, and beyond. We applaud these organizations for providing services to those who have selflessly pledged to protect our freedom and way of life. But the Veterans for Housing Initiative is different. Our goal is to attract and train veterans for careers in housing management. We believe that the housing industry itself, and affordable housing in particular, represents a unique opportunity for veterans to continue to give back to their community while also being an excellent career choice. LEARN MORE ABOUT VHI Subscribe to Receive All the Latest News & Updates from NCHM Join our mailing list to receive the latest industry news and training updates. SUBSCRIBE You have Successfully Subscribed! Contact Us National Center for Housing Management 333 N. 1st St., Suite 305 Training Tracks Helpful Links My Account Certificate Request Facebook X © 2024 NCHM, All Rights Reserved Live Chat is Online Chatting 0 × – undefined Chat Input Box Chat
